divs: sighting detailsred glowing planet,moving in enormous circles giving the distance it might have been.then moved left to right in straight lines. i awoke early made a.m. cofee and went outside for fresh air looked at all the stars before dawn would arrive. i was at home i thought it was aplanet because of red glow. it moved in wide circle motions then right an left,. in straight lines. amazed i was witnessing this ,it gave me a sense we are not alone ionly other alternative it' future military device but why?all i could say over and over agin is holy s--t etc.god forgive megoose bumbs examined other stars to get bearing no movement whatsoever, had to tell someone. lost sight due to sunrise.call me *(name deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: circular object moving in circular motion consistantly then straight line left & right
